metas.name: Witch Hat Atelier
metas.description:
Genres: Adventure, Drama, Fantasy Tags:Magic/Witch/Drawing/Female Protagonist/Seinen/Coming of Age/Found Family/Medieval In a world where everyone takes wonders like magic spells and dragons for granted, Coco is a girl with a simple dream: she wants to be a witch. But everybody knows magicians are born, not made, and Coco was not born with a gift for magic. Resigned to her un-magical life, Coco is about to give up on her dream to become a witch … until the day she meets Qifrey, a mysterious, traveling magician. After secretly seeing Qifrey perform magic in a way she’s never seen before, Coco soon learns what everybody “knows” might not be the truth, and discovers that her magical dream may not be as far away as it may seem...

(Source: Kodansha USA)

metas.name: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu 4th Season
metas.description: Genres: Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Psychological, Romance Tags:Isekai/Male Protagonist/Magic/Female Protagonist/Elf/Witch/Cult/Desert/Heterosexual/Medieval/Time Loop/Astronomy/Maids/Twins The fourth season of Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu.

metas.name: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken 4th Season
metas.description: Genres: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy Tags:Isekai/Kingdom Management/Agender/Magic/Ensemble Cast/Demons/Medieval/Femboy/Male Protagonist The fourth season of Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken.

metas.name: Classroom of the Elite 2nd Year
metas.description:
Genres: Drama, Psychological Tags:Anti-Hero/Philosophy/Boarding School/Survival/Battle Royale/School/Male Protagonist/Coming of Age/Heterosexual/Bullying/Fugitive/Primarily Teen Cast/Delinquents/Athletics/Female Harem/Love Triangle The fourth season of Youkoso Jitsuryoku Shijou Shugi no Kyoushitsu e.

As Ayanokouji and his classmates begin their second year at the Advanced Nurturing High School, they’re greeted by a fresh gauntlet of exams and a fresh batch of rather unique first-year students. They’ll have to get to know each other quickly, because the first special exam pairs the first-years with the second-years on a written test—with only the second-years facing expulsion if their team performs poorly! Worse yet? It seems one of the new first-years is also from the White Room. Can Ayanokouji avoid expulsion while sussing out the identity of this hidden foe?

(Source: Seven Seas)

metas.name: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsunomanika Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken 2nd Season
metas.description: Genres: Romance, Slice of Life Tags:Heterosexual/Male Protagonist/Female Protagonist/Kuudere/Primarily Teen Cast/School/Iyashikei The second season of Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsunomanika Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken.

metas.name: Tsue to Tsurugi no Wistoria Season 2
metas.description: Genres: Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy Tags:Magic/Swordplay/Male Protagonist/Primarily Teen Cast/Shounen/Medieval The second season of Tsue to Tsurugi no Wistoria.

metas.name: Dr. STONE: SCIENCE FUTURE Part 3
metas.description: Genres: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Sci-Fi Tags: The third and final cour of the fourth season of Dr.STONE.

metas.name: Daemons of the Shadow Realm
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy Tags:Male Protagonist/Twins In a remote mountain village under the watchful eyes of two stone guardians, the young Yuru contentedly lives off the land while staying close to the only family he has left—Asa, his precious twin sister. Asa, meanwhile, carries out a mysterious “duty” on behalf of the village while locked in a cage. Why is Asa a prisoner? And what other secrets does Yuru’s otherwise idyllic home hide?

(Source: Square Enix)

metas.name: Dorohedoro (Shin Season)
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy, Horror, Mystery Tags:Anti-Hero/Gore/Magic/Urban Fantasy/Dystopian/Revenge/Amnesia/Primarily Adult Cast/Ensemble Cast/Male Protagonist/Seinen/Surreal Comedy/Monster Boy/Curses Sequel season to Dorohedoro.

Note: Title is provisional and subject to change.

metas.name: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun 4
metas.description: Genres: Comedy, Fantasy, Supernatural Tags:School/Shounen/Demons/Primarily Teen Cast/Magic/Monster Boy/Monster Girl/Band/Isekai/Ensemble Cast/Found Family The fourth season of Mairimashita! Iruma-kun.

metas.name: Honzuki no Gekokujou: Ryoushu no Youjo
metas.description:
Genres: Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life Tags:Coming of Age/Magic/Writing/Female Protagonist/Isekai/Politics/Religion/Gods/Josei/Medieval/Disability/Adoption/Food/Economics Anime adaptation of Part 3 of Honzuki no Gekokujou.

Following a disastrous encounter with a noble, Myne finally resolves to say goodbye to her family and friends in the lower city, changing her name to “Rozemyne” and beginning her new life as the adopted daughter of Ehrenfest’s archduke. However, her days as an archnoble in noble society are brutal, as she is put through rigorous etiquette and magic training on top of her duties as High Bishop and forewoman. It all proves too much for a weak little seven-year-old girl... Or it would have, had the High Priest not offered her the keys to the temple’s book room as a reward. If she could get her hands on those, she’d be able to read all sorts of precious books! Her name may have changed, but Rozemyne’s passion for books remains the same as she charges into a whole new world! The detailed setting expands as the printing industry grows in size. Here begins Part 3 of this biblio-fantasy for book lovers everywhere!

(Source: J-Novel Club)

metas.name: The Beginning After the End Season 2
metas.description: Genres: Action, Adventure, Fantasy Tags:Isekai/Male Protagonist/Magic/Dragons/Elf/Medieval The second season of Saikyou no Ousama, Nidome no Jinsei wa Nani wo Suru?

metas.name: My Hero Academia Special Episode “More”
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Adventure Tags:Superhero/Male Protagonist/Shounen "More," a new story by Kohei Horikoshi, is being adapted into an anime! It tells the story of Deku and friends after the final episode, published in the 42nd and final volume of the original manga.

(Source: Official Website, translated)

metas.name: Isekai Nonbiri Nouka 2
metas.description: Genres: Tags:Agriculture/Isekai/Male Protagonist/Kingdom Management/Female Harem/Iyashikei/Heterosexual/Magic/Female Protagonist The second season of Isekai Nonbiri Nouka.

metas.name: The Warrior Princess and the Barbaric King
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Fantasy, Romance Tags:Female Protagonist/Heterosexual/Foreign/Shounen/War Serafina de Lavillant, the strongest female knight in the West, was sent to subjugate the barbaric tribes of the East. But when her mission fails spectacularly, she’s captured alive and imprisoned. Humiliated and dreading what horrific torture she’ll endure, she asks to be put to death. To her surprise, rather than tearing her limb from limb, the tribe leader asks for her hand…in marriage! Will Serafina face a cruel and abusive arranged marriage? Or will she discover that these tribes aren’t as barbaric as she was led to believe?

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)

metas.name: Yozakura-san Chi no Daisakusen 2nd Season
metas.description: Genres: Action, Comedy, Romance Tags:Shounen The second season of Yozakura-san Chi no Daisakusen.

metas.name: MARRIAGETOXIN
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Comedy, Drama, Romance Tags:Marriage/Crime/Urban/Bisexual For centuries, the deadly arts have been perfected by those known as the Masters. Among them, the Poison Masters of the Five Great Families hold the most fearsome power and influence. Hikaru Gero, heir to the Poison Masters’ Gero Family, has lived his entire life in the underworld, far removed from love or marriage. But when the Gero Family head decrees that Hikaru’s sister must bear an heir to preserve the bloodline—by force if necessary—Hikaru resolves to protect her at all costs. It is then that Hikaru encounters Mei Kinosaki, a brilliant marriage swindler who becomes the target of his latest job. Realizing that the only way of solving the family succession problem and protecting his sister is through marriage, Hikaru impulsively asks Mei for help in finding a bride.

(Source: EMOTION Label Channel)

metas.name: Class de 2-banme ni Kawaii Onnanoko to Tomodachi ni Natta
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Romance Tags:Seinen/School/Primarily Teen Cast/Heterosexual I, Maki Maehara, was the loner boy in my class, until I made my first friend, Umi Asanagi. Asanagi is always at the center of attention, and boys considered her to be "the second cutest girl in the class." I thought I was just a guy in the shadows, living in a completely different world from her, but it turned out that she liked B-movies, too! Now Asanagi-san secretly comes over to my house on Fridays after school. We have a great time together, as we share the same interests in movies, games, and manga.

"Sit next to me and we can read manga together."
"This is my bed......."
"It's my bed for now. Come on, come over here."

Isn't that a bit too close, Asanagi-san?

(Source: ComicWalker, translated)

metas.name: LIAR GAME
metas.description:
Genres: Drama, Psychological
Tags:Gambling/Seinen/Death Game
Wishing she would live up to the ideal, Kanzaki Nao's father named her thusly for “honesty”. Nao has more than lived up to her father's wishes--even exceeding them and earning the label of "a foolishly honest girl". This makes Nao the least qualified candidate for the high stakes 'Liar Game', where winning requires deceiving the opponent out of their money and losing means receiving massive debt. However, that doesn't stop a box containing a hundred million yen in cash and a card informing her of her participation in the game from arriving at her doorstep, nor does it stop her from being promptly tricked out of the entire sum of money. Upon hearing that a genius swindler, responsible for the bankruptcy of a major corporation, is being released from jail, Nao goes to the swindler, Shinichi Akiyama, to enlist his help. With that, the two are drawn into the dark, greed-filled, and deceptive world of the Liar Game.

metas.name: Kanan-sama wa Akumade Choroi
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Ecchi, Fantasy, Romance Tags:Demons/School/Tsundere/Heterosexual/Female Protagonist/Nudity/Male Protagonist/Slapstick/Female Harem/Shounen A beautiful and alluring devil that devours human souls has descended…

Kanan, the "Gourmet Devil", descends upon a high school in the human world to devour young, sweet souls, and her first sacrifice is Youji Kyougi: "It's a high privilege to be devoured by yours truly. Be thankful, inferior creature."

However… For some reason, she and Kyougi end up making a romantic contract?! For the innocent Kanan, who has lived for thousands of years without experiencing first love, every day is filled with excitement! Going home together?! Holding hands?! Going on dates?! A first time?!?!?!?!

"You damn inferior creature—!"

The first-love rom-com about a cute and simple-minded devil begins♪

(Source: Official Site, translated)

metas.name: Akane-banashi
metas.description:
Genres: Drama Tags:Rakugo/Female Protagonist/Coming of Age/Acting/Found Family/Primarily Adult Cast/Revenge/Shounen/Work/Family Life/School "With only your voice and body—master the art."

Akane Ousaki, captivated since childhood by the magical performances of her father, Shinta Arakawa, witnesses a shocking incident during his decisive performance for promotion to shin’uchi (master rank).

Six years later, now a high school student, she sets her sights on becoming a shin’uchi herself—pushing forward in the highly competitive world of rakugo.

A passionate and authentic rakugo drama begins now!

(Source: tv asahi, edited)

metas.name: Aishiteru Game wo Owarasetai
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Romance Tags:Female Protagonist/Male Protagonist/Heterosexual/Primarily Teen Cast/Coming of Age/School/Tsundere/Shounen The first step to winning the Love Game is saying “I love you.” So how do you lose? By admitting you’re in love!

Let the games begin! Since childhood, Yukiya Asagi and Miku Sakura have played the Love Game, where they try to fluster each other with a simple “I love you.” But after falling in love for real and refusing to admit it, neither of them can afford to lose this battle!

After leaving behind his image as a quiet nerd, Yukiya’s ready to break hearts and take names with the ultimate high school glow-up. Well, he’s really just got one girl in his sights - his best friend, Miku! Using her favorite shojo manga as his weapon, he’s ready to pin her to the wall and gaze at her with a perfect smolder. Will his moves get her heart racing?

(Source: Viz Media)

metas.name: NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE
metas.description:
Genres: Adventure, Drama, Psychological, Slice of Life Tags:Female Protagonist/VTuber A multi-ending adventure about a girl with quite a need for approval who wants to become the bestest streamer = Internet Angel

(Source: WSS playground, edited)

Note: The series had an advanced screening titled NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE -OVERTURE- at Theater Shinjuku and Theater Umeda on March 6, 2026.

metas.name: Petals of Reincarnation
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Supernatural Tags:Shounen/Super Power/Historical Touya Senji is talentless. He's tried everything but he can't seem to excel at anything no matter how hard he tries. Then he meets Haito, a Kendo champion and... humanity's protector? She uses the Stem of Reincarnation to draw on the abilities of her past lives, but it only works when she slits her own throat. And now she wants Touya to join her?!

(Source: Mangamo, edited)

metas.name: Kanojo, Okarishimasu 5th Season
metas.description: Genres: Comedy, Romance Tags:Heterosexual/Fake Relationship/Female Harem/Male Protagonist/Primarily Adult Cast The fifth season of Kanojo, Okarishimasu.

metas.name: Higeki no Genkyou to Naru Saikyou Gedou Last Boss Joou wa Tami no Tame ni Tsukushimasu.  Season 2
metas.description: Genres: Comedy, Fantasy, Romance Tags:Medieval/Female Protagonist/Villainess/Family Life/Super Power/Ojou-sama/Swordplay The second season of Higeki no Genkyou to Naru Saikyou Gedou Last Boss Joou wa Tami no Tame ni Tsukushimasu.

metas.name: Shunkashuutou Daikousha: Haru no Mai
metas.description:
Genres: Drama, Fantasy, Romance Tags:Heterosexual/Urban Fantasy/Mythology/Environmental/Ensemble Cast/Shoujo/Crime/Politics Once upon a time, there was Winter. Winter was once the only season in the world—but such an existence was too lonely to bear, and so it created Spring to love. Before long, the earth wished for more time to rest in the cycle, and Summer and Autumn were born. The ones who carry the cycle are called the Agents of the Four Seasons. Hinagiku, the Vernal Agent, disappeared from this land ten years ago, taking the season of spring with her. Now, after incredible hardship, she has returned to restore the cycle to its proper state—and, as in the myth passed down since the dawn of time, she sends her love to Winter.

(Source: Yen Press)

metas.name: Otaku ni Yasashii Gal wa Inai!?
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Romance Tags:Gyaru/Anti-Hero/War/Otaku Culture/Seinen/School/Primarily Teen Cast Meet Takuya Seo, an otaku who sits behind the popular gals in class, Ijichi and Amane. Since they're people from different "castes," you wouldn't expect them to have much in common. But when their worlds collide over a borrowed eraser, Takuya slips up about his favorite anime, and Amane...is rather quick to correct him. She says she's not a fan, but her familiarity with the series suggests otherwise. Could she be...a fellow geek?!

(Source: Yen Press)

metas.name: Kamiina Botan, Yoeru Sugata wa Yuri no Hana
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Romance, Slice of Life
Tags:Yuri/Female Protagonist/Primarily Female Cast/Primarily Adult Cast/College/Seinen/Cute Girls Doing Cute Things/Food/Ensemble Cast/LGBTQ+ Themes
Kamiina Botan is a 20-year-old college student.
At the welcome party for the dorm she was assigned to, the dorm leader Ibuki gives her a highball to drink and she becomes tipsy, leading to her involvement with Ibuki from now on... A tipsy teasing girl's comedy!

metas.name: The Ramparts of Ice
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Romance, Slice of Life Tags:School/Ensemble Cast/Shoujo Socially inept, Higawa Koyuki maintains a wall between herself and other people. She spends her time in high school alone, until she meets Amamiya Minato, a boy who keeps trying to close the distance between them for some reason?!

The loner Koyuki, the popular Miki, the boundary-less Minato, and the kind basketball player Youta. This is the story about four complicated and confused young people and their mixed up lives!

(Source: Margaret, translated)

metas.name: Diamond no Ace act II: Second Season
metas.description: Genres: Sports Tags:Baseball/Male Protagonist/Primarily Male Cast/Shounen/School Club/Boarding School/Primarily Teen Cast/Ensemble Cast/Cute Boys Doing Cute Things The second season of Diamond no Ace act II.

metas.name: Yowa Yowa Sensei
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Ecchi, Romance Tags:Shounen/Teacher/School Yowa Yowa Sensei follows Akihito Abikura, a 2nd year high school student who is intimidated to discover that he's been assigned to the class of Hiyori Hiwamura, a notoriously scary teacher. However, Akihito soon discovers that Hiyori isn't actually scary, she's just extremely shy.

(Source: Crunchyroll News, edited)

metas.name: Awajima Hyakkei
metas.description:
Genres: Drama, Music, Romance Tags:School/Primarily Female Cast/Episodic/Ensemble Cast/Josei Awajima Opera School—where countless girls from across the country flock in hopes of one day standing on the big stage. As they work toward achieving their dreams of stardom, their time at Awajima is filled with as much friendship and admiration as competition and jealousy. The precious feelings of girls who are at once both classmates and rivals, tenderly captured in the portraits of an ensemble cast!

(Source: Yen Press)

metas.name: Saikyou no Shokugyou wa Yuusha demo Kenja demo Naku Kanteishi (Kari) Rashii desu yo?
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy Tags:Isekai Hibiki, a high school student who was suddenly transferred to another world, wanders alone in a vast grassland of a fantasy world where monsters inhabit. All he has are non-combat skills such as "Appraisal"! From a hopeless situation, he is saved by encounters, and his all-powerful abilities blossom! An another world adventure tale of miraculous reversal cheats burst forth!

(Source: Alpha Manga)

metas.name: Kuroneko to Majo no Kyoushitsu
metas.description:
Genres: Tags:Female Protagonist/Animals/Heterosexual/Magic/Curses/Shapeshifting/Witch Spica Virgo is an apprentice witch, but can’t use any magic. She needs someone to be her master in order to get into the academy of her dreams, but she has no money and no connections. Suddenly, a mysterious talking black cat that can use magic appears before her!! Spica wants to learn magic, and the black cat wants his curse broken—goals on the same path. Therefore, a secret master-apprentice relationship was born! But the key to breaking the curse is kissing his…?! A clumsy witch and the teachings of a black cat—the magic academy fantasy starts here!!

(Source: K Manga)

metas.name: MAO
metas.description:
Genres: Drama, Romance, Supernatural Tags:Female Protagonist/Shounen/Male Protagonist Nanoka passes through a portal into the Taisho era, where exorcist Mao reluctantly rescues her from the jaws of a grotesque yokai. When Nanoka gets back to the present, she discovers she has some new, incredible abilities. She returns to the past looking for answers, only to get caught up in Mao’s investigation of a series of gruesome murders. As her questions about herself multiply, Nanoka learns that Mao is cursed by a cat demon named Byoki—and so is his sword. If anyone but Mao attempts to wield it, they are doomed. But when Mao’s life is in jeopardy, Nanoka picks up his blade and swings!

(Source: VIZ Media)

metas.name: Jishou Akuyaku Reijou na Konyakusha no Kansatsu Kiroku.
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Fantasy, Romance, Slice of Life Tags:Villainess/Heterosexual/Shoujo Because Prince Cecil is extraordinarily intelligent, life is boring for him. His days are without much excitement, but he becomes engaged to Bertia, the daughter of a marquis. The first thing she says to him when they first meet is quite baffling. She claims she is the "villainous heroine" in the story of his life!! According to Bertia, she has memories of her previous life. In a certain "romance game" she played in her life before, she played the character of the "villainess." Her purpose in her new life is to become an exemplary villainess and ruin the prince's engagement. In order to achieve this goal, Bertia does one outrageous thing after another and brings chaos and confusion into his life. A unique "love" story with a twist!!

(Source: Alpha Manga)

metas.name: Ponkotsu Fuuki Iin to Skirt take ga Futekisetsu na JK no Hanashi
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Romance, Slice of Life Tags:School/Male Protagonist/Gyaru/Heterosexual/Tsundere Sakuradaimon is the school's prefect. A prefect is a student who is authorized to enforce discipline. As a prefect, he's supposed to be a role model to other students, but unfortunately he's not perfect. Kohinata is one of the people who Sakuradaimon has tried to discipline into wearing appropriate school attire, but she has thusfar been disobedient.

And so this is a story of the two interacting with one another.

metas.name: Koko wa Ore ni Makasete Saki ni Ike to Ittekara 10-nen ga Tattara Densetsu ni Natteita.
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Adventure, Fantasy Tags:Male Protagonist With no other options, Luck makes the choice to hold the line against the unending demonic hordes alone, to make sure his comrades can escape with their lives. However, through a combination of fortune, skill, and ingenuity, he holds that line for ten straight years, eventually coming out on top single handedly. Now he has to tackle the dilemma of how to occupy himself in a world where he holds a myriad of roles: that of a legend, that of a veteran, and that of a brand new face.

(Source: Comikey)

metas.name: Nigashita Sakana wa Ookikatta ga Tsuriageta Sakana ga Ookisugita Ken
metas.description:
Genres: Fantasy, Romance Tags:Heterosexual/Royal Affairs/Shoujo From a very young age, people noticed that Maria, the youngest daughter of a duke, was filled with potential. She was raised as the heiress of her house, until the birth of her baby brother relieves her of her duties. She scrambles to find a husband, but all the eligible bachelors in her duchy are taken!

At this rate, she's doomed to the life of a spinster!

Maria decides to study abroad in Rubini in hopes of finding a husband, with the help of her distant relative, Aida. But in a twist of fate, the Crown Prince breaks off his engagement with Maria, even though they've never met before!

"Huh?! I don't remember getting engaged!?"

Enjoy this fluffy romcom with a late-blooming villainess!

(Source: Manga UP! Global)

metas.name: Maid-san wa Taberu dake
metas.description:
Genres: Slice of Life Tags:Food/Maids/Iyashikei/Cute Girls Doing Cute Things What's a maid to do when she finds herself suddenly stuck in Japan for a year? Eat, of course! Follow maid-in-training Suzume Tachibana as she tries all sorts of Japanese food, from sweets like taiyaki and melon bread to savory snacks like takoyaki and onigiri! Be warned, though—while Suzume sates her appetite through delicious treat after delicious treat, she might just end up whetting yours!

(Source: Kodansha USA)

metas.name: Haibara-kun no Tsuyokute Seishun New Game
metas.description:
Genres: Romance, Slice of Life Tags:Heterosexual/Age Regression We all have embarrassing memories or deep regrets from high school, right? Socially anxious college senior Natsuki Haibara sure does. When he thinks back on that time of his life, all he has are fleeting fantasies of a happy adolescence that could have been. Imagine his bewilderment and surprise, then, when he inexplicably finds himself seven years in the past—one month before his first year of high school! Can Haibara avoid his previous mistakes, make his way to the top of the school social pyramid, and end up with the girl of his dreams? Or will he be forced to relive three years of solitude as the most hated guy in school? He’ll need all the help he can get in order to succeed, from a workout regimen to online how-to guides, a childhood friend, and plenty of sheer willpower. Watch as Haibara takes a second shot at his teenage years!

(Source: J-Novel Club)

metas.name: Kill Ao
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Comedy Tags:Age Regression/School Club/School/Assassins/Urban/Ensemble Cast/Shounen/Guns Juuzou Oogami is a legendary hitman who has never failed an assignment, no matter how impossible. One day, after wiping out a powerful organization, he is stung by a mysterious wasp and collapses. When he wakes up, the fearsome 39-year-old assassin has been transformed into a 13-year-old boy!

Before he can even process what happened, his boss delivers a new order: “In that body, infiltrate a middle school.”

What awaits him is an unexpected school life filled with colorful classmates, youthful chaos, and looming danger. Can Juuzou ever return to his original form? Or will the assassins closing in on him end his second life before it even begins!?

(Source: Official Site)

metas.name: Kami no Niwatsuki Kusunoki-tei
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life Tags:Youkai/Rural/Iyashikei Deep in the countryside, Minato Kusunoki is left in charge of a terrifying house overflowing with evil spirits—or at least, it was full until his extraordinary ability cleared them all out! Instead, a procession of unique and peculiar gods is drawn to the comfort of the purified Kusunoki residence, and Minato spends his days relaxing in the company of his spiritual neighbors. What else lies in store for Minato as he lives peacefully surrounded by gods?

(Source: Yen Press)

metas.name: Ichijouma Mankitsu Gurashi
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Ecchi, Slice of Life Tags:Cute Girls Doing Cute Things/Restaurant/Female Protagonist/Primarily Female Cast/Work/Primarily Teen Cast A high school girl a manga cafe! Meiko, a countryside girl, enrolls in a rich girls' school. She is told that if she does volunteer work, her tuition will be free... but in reality, she will be living and working in a "manga cafe"!? Living in a small manga cafe booth turns out to be not so bad! Why not try enjoying a manga cafe filled with cute high school girls as staff?

(Source: Bookwalker, translated)

metas.name: Snowball Earth
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Mecha, Sci-Fi Tags:Full CGI/Artificial Intelligence/Post-Apocalyptic/Male Protagonist/Snowscape "Yukio... I'm going to make a friend." A shy boy named Tetsuo. The only thing he had was a giant robot named Yukio. They became "saviors" in the fight against the galactic monsters coming from outer space. After the final battle, Tetsuo returns to Earth for the first time in ten years and witnesses an astonishing world. It's a frozen Earth (named Snowball Earth), where the entire land is covered in snow and ice, being turned into a deadly world! What happened to the human race? And will Tetsuo be able to fulfill the promise he made to Yukio?

(Source: Shogakukan, translated)

metas.name: Kirio Fanclub
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Romance, Slice of Life Tags:Josei/Heterosexual/Female Protagonist/School/Love Triangle The main topic of conversation between high school girls Aimi Miyoshi and Nami Sometani is always Kirio, a boy in the same class. This one-way romantic comedy depicts the daily lives of these two friends and rivals, which never seems to have reached the point of love yet.

(Source: Ruelle Comics, translated)

metas.name: Hidarikiki no Eren
metas.description:
Genres: Drama
Tags:Primarily Adult Cast/Ensemble Cast
Asakura Kouichi is a young designer working for an advertising agency. Lost and confused after being dropped from a project he worked hard to secure, he travels to the Yokohama Museum of Art. This is the place where, many years ago, he first encountered the talented "Eren." The start of an inspirational adult ensemble drama about creatives!

metas.name: Mahou no Shimai Lulutto Lilly
metas.description:
Genres: Mahou Shoujo Tags:Idol/Female Protagonist/Magic/Henshin Fuu and Rui, who used to be close, but have been a bit distant from each other recently. One day, Fuu encounters a mysterious spaceship and gains magical powers. At that same time, Rui also gains magical powers, and both transform into the adults they dream to be. The sisters' powers come with two conditions: their magic powers can only be used in one year, and no one must know about it. Unaware of each other's secrets, Fuu and Rui become active as idols.

(Source: Anime News Network)
